title: The One Where Monica Gets a New Roomate (The Pilot-The Uncut Version)

questions.question: What does Monica say is 'just some guy I work with'?
questions.explanation: Monica tells her friends 'There's nothing to tell! He's just some guy I work with!' when asked about Paul.

questions.question: What is the unusual thing that Phoebe asks if the guy Monica is going out with does?
questions.explanation: Phoebe asks if the guy eats chalk, referencing a past experience with someone named Carl.

questions.question: What is the dream that Chandler describes to the group?
questions.explanation: Chandler shares a dream where he is standing naked in a cafeteria and there is a phone where his genital area should be.

questions.question: Why is Ross upset?
options: His wife left him for another man
He got into a car accident
questions.correct_answer: His wife left him for another man
questions.explanation: Ross's wife Carol has left him, and he is struggling to cope with the situation.

questions.question: What is the object that Rachel was admiring before she realized she didn't want to marry Barry?
questions.explanation: Rachel was looking at a beautiful gravy boat and realized she was more turned on by it than by her fiancé Barry.

questions.question: What is the name of the soap opera that the friends are watching at Monica's apartment?
questions.explanation: The friends are watching an episode of the soap opera 'Joanne Loves Chaci' at Monica's apartment.

questions.question: What does Joey suggest Ross do to get over his divorce?
questions.explanation: Joey suggests that Ross go to a strip club to take his mind off his divorce and have some fun.

questions.question: What is the problem that Paul reveals he has been experiencing since his ex-girlfriend left him?
options: He has been unable to sleep
He has been unable to eat
He has been unable to perform sexually
He has been unable to hold down a job
questions.correct_answer: He has been unable to perform sexually
questions.explanation: Paul confesses to Monica that he has been unable to perform sexually since his ex-girlfriend left him two years ago.

questions.question: What does Rachel decide to do after her wedding is called off?
options: She goes on her honeymoon alone
She stays with Monica and tries to start a new life
She tries to win Barry back
She goes back to her parents' house
questions.correct_answer: She stays with Monica and tries to start a new life
questions.explanation: Rachel decides to stay with Monica and start fresh, rather than going on her honeymoon or trying to win Barry back.

questions.question: What is the job that Joey claims to have?
questions.explanation: Joey tells Rachel that he is an actor, although he admits that most of his work is regional and not very well-known.

questions.question: What does Phoebe do to help Rachel relax when she is feeling stressed?
options: She sings a song to her
She makes her a cup of coffee
questions.correct_answer: She sings a song to her
questions.explanation: Phoebe sings a soothing song to help Rachel relax when she is feeling stressed and overwhelmed.

questions.question: What does Monica's coworker Frannie reveal about Paul?
questions.explanation: Frannie reveals that she used to date Paul and is responsible for helping him to overcome his sexual dysfunction.

questions.question: Why is Monica upset with Paul?
options: He lied to her about his job
He used a line to get her into bed
He didn't call her after their date
questions.correct_answer: He used a line to get her into bed
questions.explanation: Monica is upset with Paul because he used a line to get her into bed, and she feels deceived and used.

questions.question: What does Ross say is the scariest part of his situation?
options: That he will never find love again
That there is only one woman for everybody
That he will have to start over
questions.correct_answer: That there is only one woman for everybody
questions.explanation: Ross says that the scariest part of his situation is the possibility that there is only one woman for everybody, and he may have already missed his chance.

questions.question: What does Joey compare women to?
questions.explanation: Joey compares women to flavors of ice cream, saying that there are many different kinds and you can try a new one whenever you want.

questions.question: What is the name of the restaurant where Monica works?
questions.explanation: Monica works at a restaurant called Iridium, where she is a chef.

questions.question: What does Chandler do when he is working on Ross's furniture?
options: He throws away a leftover part
questions.correct_answer: He throws away a leftover part
questions.explanation: Chandler throws away a leftover part from Ross's furniture, rather than trying to figure out where it goes.

questions.question: What is the name of the song that Phoebe sings in the subway?
questions.explanation: Phoebe sings a song called 'Love is Sweet' in the subway, although the exact title is not explicitly stated.

questions.question: What does Rachel try to make for Joey and Chandler?
questions.explanation: Rachel tries to make coffee for Joey and Chandler, but they end up pouring it into a plant because it tastes bad.

questions.question: What does Monica decide to do after her conversation with Frannie?
options: She confronts Paul about his past
She decides to stop seeing Paul
She tries to get over Paul
She goes to work and tries to focus on her job
questions.correct_answer: She goes to work and tries to focus on her job
questions.explanation: Monica decides to go to work and try to focus on her job, rather than dwelling on her feelings about Paul.

questions.question: What is the advice that Phoebe gives to Monica when she is upset?
options: To try to understand Paul's perspective
Not to hate, because it puts negative energy into the universe
questions.correct_answer: Not to hate, because it puts negative energy into the universe
questions.explanation: Phoebe advises Monica not to hate, because it puts negative energy into the universe and can attract more negative experiences.

questions.question: What does Joey do when Chandler teases him about his acting career?
options: He gets angry and storms out of the room
He laughs it off and makes a joke
He tries to defend his career choices
He starts singing a song from one of his plays
questions.correct_answer: He gets angry and storms out of the room
questions.explanation: Joey gets angry and storms out of the room when Chandler teases him about his acting career.

questions.question: What is the reaction of the friends when they hear that Paul used a line to get Monica into bed?
options: They are disappointed but try to be supportive
questions.explanation: The friends are amused and teasing when they hear that Paul used a line to get Monica into bed, and they joke about it.

questions.question: What does Rachel decide to do at the end of the episode?
options: She goes back to her fiancé Barry
She stays with Monica and tries to start a new life
She gets a job and starts to build a new life
She goes on a trip to clear her head
questions.correct_answer: She gets a job and starts to build a new life
questions.explanation: Rachel decides to get a job and start building a new life, rather than going back to her old life or running away from her problems.
